Title: Requires notification of tenants in their native language of impending conversions and bona fide offers to purchase
Summary: Requires notification of tenants in their native language of impending conversions and bona fide offers to purchase.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to requiring notification of tenants in their native language of impending conversions and bona fide offers to purchase
